website_summaries.verdict: The Zotac GTX 750 is a great graphics card for those who crave power efficiency, but gamers have better budget options.
pros: Fits into nearly any PC case
No need for a secondary GPU power connector
cons: Soundly beaten by other cards in its category in almost all gaming tests

customer_reviews.title: Great card!
customer_reviews.text: This card is perfect for someone who doesnt want to spend 300$ to play their games on max settings. I've been able to play everything maxed out so far. Titanfall, Warcraft, Diablo 3, so far everything runs great. Went from a nvidia 9600 to this and it is a major upgrade. Like the 9600 i expect this card to last many years and it definitly plays the current gen of games on max settings assuming your cpu isn't limiting you. Easy install, is a little thicker than the 9600 card i had but installed no problem. I didnt use the drivers and overclock utility i just got the nvidia driver from www.nvidia.com instead.
customer_reviews.author: paracelx

customer_reviews.title: It's doing what it's supposed to be doing (& doing it fast!).
customer_reviews.text: It's doing what it's supposed to be doing (& doing it fast!). No problems after ~6 months. I've always had good luck with Zotac (& no, I am not affiliated with Zotac in any way).
customer_reviews.author: R. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Put it in and it has worked great, better than the old one
customer_reviews.text: I was having some video problems with my computer. Decided to replace the video card with a similar card. Got this one, which is cheaper than my current card. Put it in and it has worked great, better than the old one, even in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: CL Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very good with games
customer_reviews.text: Very good with games, but it makes the text a little blurry, might be my adjustment. Easy installation, computer found it right away.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the very best graphic card that you can get for the money. It's a charmer and if you get this card you will thank me.
customer_reviews.author: William Bargo

customer_reviews.title: great card
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, great card for the money. Low power draw and quiet fan are huge pluses, too.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Kuhl

customer_reviews.title: performance is pretty good. I would do a GTX 750 before ...
customer_reviews.text: Zotac makes cheap stuff. The mini HDMI port malfunctions alot. There are purple "sparkles" all over the screen. The two other monitors connected to the DVI ports down have the same issues. using another mini HDMI cable doesnt work. That being said.... performance is pretty good. I would do a GTX 750 before any other low end GPU from any other manufacturer. Runs super cool and the fan is pretty silent. If you are considering the Asus Strix 750ti, spend a little more for a GTX950 strix for a truly silent GPU option. If you haave the PSU connectors of course
customer_reviews.author: DuxSyagrius

customer_reviews.title: Worked in my HP p6331p
customer_reviews.text: Gave new life to this older 4 core AMD system with a 300 watt PSU. I now get excellent response and graphics on the attached 1920x1080 24in monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Borgen

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and works with my 350 watt power supply
customer_reviews.text: Raised the windows graphic rating from 5.9 with the onboard HD6530 to 7.3 with this card. Easy install and works with my 350 watt power supply.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C McC

customer_reviews.title: BIG BOOST OF PERFORMANCE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my Nvidia 9800 GT and this card provides a much better video performance for gaming and even if you don't game it will allow you to connect 3 displays to it! I used this cable  because a adapter wouldn't fit while 2 DVI connections were being used.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plays games like minecraft, etc great! Great item for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Gottschalk

product_meta.title: Zotac GeForce GTX 750 1GB GDDR5 PCI Express 3.0 DVI Mini-HDMI Graphics Card ZT-70701-10M
product_meta.description: Embrace fast, smooth and quiet gaming in the latest games with the innovative and feature-rich ZOTAC GeForce GTX 750. The ZOTAC GeForce GTX 750 takes gaming to the next level with serious power that enables gamers to crank up the settings and resolution for stunning visuals, super-fast frame rate and smooth performance.
feature_bullets: 1GB DDR5 128 bit Engine Clock - Base clock: 1033MHz, Boost Clock 1111 MHz Memory Clock: 5000 MHz (5.0Gbps)
NVIDIA Maxwell GPU architecture NVIDIA Adaptive Vertical Sync Technology NVIDIA 3D Vision Ready
Microsoft DirectX 11.2 API (feature level 11_0)Two dual-link DVI (DVI-I + DVI-D) + mini-HDMI Power consumption 34; 55W

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars23 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
